Articles.Content:
Another Mars game showed up on Kickstarter and Greenlight in the last week. This one isn't really related at all to KSP or even Race to Mars, but it looks interesting nevertheless.

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/tylerowen/lacuna-passage

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156439230

I just popped over to see if this was mentioned here or not.

It definitely looks interesting to me.

I have been playing another Mars based game (Mars Colony Challenger), so seeing yet another game that will be set on Mars definitely caught my attention. Especially due to the realism they are aiming for, and the exploration and survival aspects it is to have.

Two other sites I know of relating to it.

The site for the group making it, and an Indie DB page

http://randomseedgames.com/

http://www.indiedb.com/games/lacuna-passage
